Title: Electronic Notice for the Annual Inspection of Transport lorry
Text:
Hear me, everyone. The Annual Inspection of the Transport lorries for the mines is about to begin. Bring your license when you go to the inspection. It must be valid.
Anyone with an expired license will all be considered uncertified personnel. You’re gonna be denied access to your vehicle, no matter how experienced you are as a driver.
The inspection will take place from the end of this month to the middle of the next. Bring your ID papers and file your application at Ministry of Development. The time of the examination will be published on another occasion.
Ready the files attached here carefully before you go and get yourself prepared. You’re gonna want to thank me.

Attachments: 1) Particulars of the Annual Inspections of Transport Lorries at the mine
2) Basic Criteria for the Assessments of Vehicle Driving Skills
